alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Douglas; Howell; Oregon; Ozark; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 5:59PM CST until January 15 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Howell, Oregon, Barry, Christian, Douglas, Ozark, Stone, and Taney Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses are slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear layered clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Barry; Christian; Douglas; Howell; Oregon; Ozark; Stone; Taney
